alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Haywood; Lauderdale; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 11:24AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Crockett, southeastern Dyer, southeastern Lauderdale, central Haywood and northwestern Madison Counties through NOON CDT... At 1124 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nutbush, or 9 miles southeast of Ripley, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Brownsville, Alamo, Bells, Halls, Chestnut Bluff, Nutbush, Belle Eagle, Holly Grove, Forked Deer, Adair, Maury City, Friendship, Gates, Gadsden, Hawkinsville, Quincy, Allens, Christmasville and Jones. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
